idea-plugin.name: Treant
idea-plugin.description:
Treant is a Kotlin compiler plugin that eliminates logging boilerplate by generating a log property in the companion object of annotated classes. Simply annotate your class with @Slf4j, @Log, @Log4j, @Log4j2, @CommonsLog, or @XSlf4j and Treant generates the correct logger instance at compile time.

This IDE plugin provides full editor support for Treant-generated code:

  • Symbol resolution — the generated log companion property is recognized by the IDE, enabling code completion and navigation
  • Gutter icons — annotated classes display a marker indicating the generated logger
  • Quick documentation — hover or press Ctrl+Q on the generated log property to see its type and origin annotation
  • Conflict inspection — warns when a manually defined log in a companion object conflicts with the Treant-generated one

Requires the Treant Gradle plugin applied to your project. Supports K2 compiler only.
